Class MedicalRecord

java.lang.Object
userInfo.MedicalRecord
public class MedicalRecord extends Object
Represents a patient's medical record in the system. This class contains patient details, past diagnoses, treatments, and functionality for updating the medical record.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MedicalRecord(String hospitalID)
    Constructs a MedicalRecord object using patient data from the specified hospital ID.

    • setPhoneNumber

      public boolean setPhoneNumber(String holder)
      Sets the phone number of the patient. Validates that the phone number is 8 digits long and contains only numeric characters.
      Parameters:
      holder - The new phone number to set.
      Returns:
      True if the phone number is valid and was set; false otherwise.

    • setEmailAddress

      public boolean setEmailAddress(String holder)
      Sets the email address of the patient. Validates the email format using a regular expression.
      Parameters:
      holder - The new email address to set.
      Returns:
      True if the email is valid and was set; false otherwise.

    • addPastDiagnosisAndTreatment

      public void addPastDiagnosisAndTreatment(String diagnose, String prescription, String plan)
      Adds a past diagnosis, prescription, and treatment plan to the patient's medical record. Updates the medical record CSV file with the new diagnosis and treatment.
      Parameters:
      diagnose - The diagnosis made by the doctor.
      prescription - The prescribed treatment for the diagnosis.
      plan - The treatment plan.

    • getPastDiagnosesAndTreatment

      public ArrayList<String> getPastDiagnosesAndTreatment()
      Gets the list of the patient's past diagnoses and treatments.
      Returns:
      The list of past diagnoses and treatments.
